parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the [[Eden Editor]] is in multiplayer mode. Returns [[true]] in the following cases:
* Multiplayer Preview launched directly from [[3DEN]] - [[true]] in preview and only for the creator
* MP mission is chosen for editing when creating a server: <tt>Multiplayer - Server Browser - Host Server</tt>. When 3D EDITOR button is clicked for selected mission and 3DEN is launched, command returns [[true]] within the editor environment. (see also [[is3DEN]], [[is3DENPreview]])   

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''is3DENMultiplayer'''
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] [[is3DENMultiplayer]] [[then]] {[[systemChat]] "You are hosting a test server!"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[is3DEN]] [[is3DENPreview]] [[isMultiplayer]] [[isMultiplayerSolo]]
</value></part></template></root>
